name: fb-page-messenger-inquiry-bot-cms
description: A Facebook Page Messenger Inquiry Bot & CMS for automating customer interactions. Features real-time chat, inquiry management, webhook integration, and auto-replies using Facebook Graph API. Built with Node.js & Express. Supports live chat, re-engagement, and API-based inquiry retrieval.
author: Jonh Gall Gabayno (jggabayno) - Website: https://jggabayno.vercel.app, GitHub: https://github.com/jggabayno
